{"id":983369204,"question_id":15,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1Â year, 7Â months","timestamp":1688162614,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1429 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/983369204/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        ans=[]\n\n        for i in range(len(nums)-1):\n            if i>0 and nums[i]==nums[i-1]:\n                continue\n            \n            l=i+1\n            r=len(nums)-1\n\n            while l<r:\n                sum1=nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]\n\n                if sum1<0:\n                    l+=1\n                elif sum1>0:\n                    r-=1\n                else:\n                    ans.append([nums[l],nums[r],nums[i]])\n                    l+=1\n                    while l<r and nums[l]==nums[l-1]:\n                        l+=1\n\n\n        return ans\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
